reviews.review: Блин, вот мне нравится атмосфера в этой в игре. Это та же ХЛ2, но только более яркая что ли. В ней больше открытых пространств и тем самым, больше свежего воздуха! А так, обзор написан для числа и не преследует цели быть полезным.
Orta grafikli ve muhteşem bir hikayeye sahip

Half-Life: Episode Two review
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Pros:
+FPS
+Continuation of Half-Life 2: Episode One
+Moments full of emotions
+Great action points
+You can send a gnome into space
-------------------------------------------------- --------------------
Cons:
-There has been no continuation for a long time (Except Half-Life: Alyx because it's a prequel)
-------------------------------------------------- --------------------
Do I recommend Half-Life 2: Episode Two?
Yes
bruh, it's half life. Are you expecting this to be bad?

Последняя часть из истории Фримана. 6-12 часов геймплея, в зависимости от сложности и умения. Valve, как обычно вкусно, но мало.
Касаемо Перевода, отдельно выскажусь, также как и в Portal2 ужаснейший перевод. Многие сюжетные фразы обрываются в озвучке. Смысл оригинальной игры в некоторых местах теряется. В некоторых местах настолько все плохо, что складывается впечатление, что была нанята команда школьников, для перевода, чтобы уменьшить бюджет игры.

Once again, on par with everything in Half-Life 2, and it keeps you moving.  It starts out overall better, but that last section before the end was BRUTAL.  I think I liked this one better than the others; there was a part where I was enjoying just driving around the countryside with Alyx.  The story's good, and gets really interesting... and, of course, rather famously ends on a cliffhanger.

Almost exactly twice as long as episode 1 and half as long as HL2 this addition is quite major. Playthrough is very engaging, never boring, fast paced and offer variety of enviroments. After few years I purchased all HLs and did a rerun on hard, starting with black mesa, through hl 2 and episone one and two. This game is so awesome!
I almost don't recommend it because of the fact that the ending hasn't been resolved for 13 years. But I do so play it.
Baita jogo, continua da onde parou o HL2 e ainda tem o Ep 2.

Half life 2 is widley regarded as one of the greatest videogames of all time, and I can say it lives up to that. This is just an extension of that, its super short, but it's a must play along with the entire half life/portal series. Buy and play black mesa, then buy the orange box so you get HL2 and its episodes. It's obviously very short (took me 3 and a half hours but I beat things quick), but that doesnt mean it has any less value, considering the orange box goes on sale for like 6 bucks with 8 games in it.

Really good but I couldn't imagine trying to play the last fight without savescumming the entire way through. The cliffhanger gets progressed 5 seconds by HL:Alyx, and if you can't play vr I would suggest looking up the ending of that game. Don't expect any major closure other than the knowledge the story will progress sometimes soon as long as valve doesn't get distracted for another decade again.

Half life 2 Episode 2 is the (for now) last episode. I loved playing through the half life games again and this was a great way to end it. from black mesa in half life to white forest in episode 2 it was a ride I would recommend to everyone.

Pro's
-Amazing Visuals and sound
-Excellent voice acting I barely bond with characters usually but valve was able to make me do it
-New enemies every single game and I loved them all
-Quite a bit less of AI escorting, and if there was it was a lot better than episode 1
-A challenge in map design and enemies extremely refreshing after all the hand holding we had in newer games

Con's
-The occasional glitches nothing game breaking.
-Ended with a cliffhanger (there is hope to more since HL Alyx came out)

And that is the final episode of the half life series (for now). If you have a VR headset DO get HL Alyx, If you don't have a VR headset and are not planning to get one watch a playthrough of HL Alyx, you won't regret it. And if you're still on the fence to get this game DO GET IT YOU'LL LOVE IT.

After the Black Mesa incident and all the other events Gordan Freeman goes through in Half Life 2, Episode Two still to this day shocks gamers to the core but also impresses them with more great level design and variety in gameplay. It's short just like Episode One but has more memorable moments and we can finally use the flashlight without using up the suit's energy. That being said, I hope one day we will see the rest of the story come to a conclusion because this series has one of the best stories ever told in gaming history.

I played through this series every chance I got, and I loved every moment of it. The combat had good pacing. Every encounter was different in some way either through new weapons, tools or objectives, even if the basic idea was still just killing a bunch of enemies. You can approach every fight in many ways. The story is fantastic, and even the rooms where you have to sit around you can still play around with props and such sitting around. Never once did I feel bored. 

My only problem is that I've become a beggar for Half Life 3
Amazing, especially if you get it on sale.
